attributes.action: use the National Curriculum in schools as a tool to positively encourage national and community cohesion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For example, by emphasising the role of this country in bringing about an end to the international trafficing of slaves rather than concentrating on the trading of slaves.

This is a small difference but, by emphasising the positive you will foster greater cohesion rather than emphasising the "them and us".
